## Linear Model sample

```{r}
set.seed(20)
x <- rnorm(100)
e <- rnorm(100,0,2)
y <- 0.5+2*x+e
summary(y)

plot(x,y)
```
# -----Modelo 2

```{r}
set.seed(1)
x <- rnorm(100)

log.mu <- 0.5 + 0.3*x
y <- rpois(100, exp(log.mu))
summary(y)

plot(x,y)
```
## ----- Random Sampling

```{r}
set.seed(1)

sample(1:10,4)
sample(1:10,4)


print("Sample letters")
sample(letters,5)

print("sample w/replacement")

sample(1:10,replace = TRUE)
```
